speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing alright, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling in regard to your account with Quick Loans. Can you please confirm your full name so we can proceed?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, John. I see that your current balance is $450. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I need to figure out what I can afford this month.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely. We can set up a payment plan. How much can you commit to each month?

speaker: Customer
text: I could do $100 a month for now.

speaker: Agent
text: That works, John. I’ll go ahead and set that up. Just to confirm, the first payment will be due next week on the 8th.

speaker: Customer
text: Sounds good to me. Thank you for your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome. Is there anything else you would like to ask?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, thank you for your time, John. Have a great day!
